item.title: Grand Opening
item.description: Hear ye! Hear ye! Â¶ At last, the long wait has come to a close. I am officially opening my website to the world! It’s been a long time coming, but I finally found what it was I was looking for. As I had suspected, I was going about building a website in an incredibly wrong way. Previously I had been trying to write myself a server that would essentially act as a CMS, wherein I would send a document to the server, then the server would serve that to the front end when requested.
